mapper.insert: insert into review(review_content, user_id, star_rating, matching_board_num, matching_num) values(#{reviewContent},#{userId},#{starRating},#{boardNum},#{utmatchingNum})
mapper.update: update review set review_content=#{reviewContent}, update_date=now() where review_num=#{reviewNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where matching_board_num=#{boardNum}
